response.homeDescription: Please contact Patti Kurtz at 330.802.1675 for additional info. Build your dream home in the Village at Heron Crest! Privacy and convenience are combined in this beautiful rural location. A limited number of prime lots are available offering stunning views of the woods and yet close to major roads and all the amenities of the Merriman Valley. Choose from our 5 floor plans or let us help you design and build your own custom home. You can bring your own builder or work with our on-site builder Stanik Properties. Visit our Model Home. The option of a walk-out lower level is available on selected lots. Woodridge Schools, city utilities. Choose from 1/4 Acre to 3 Acre lots.
